attributes.action: equalise State and Private sector retirement ages to 67, and contribution rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The State sector enjoys a ridiculousley high pension benefit from the taxpayer both in terms of an early retirement age and overly high contributions of upto 18% of salary.
The retirement age should be lifted to 67 and the contribution rate should be no more than 10%. If the public workers go on strike, fire them, there are plenty of eastern european workers who would accept those terms.
